titles.title: Isekai Tensei de Kenja ni Natte Boukensha Seikatsu: "Mahou Kairyou" de Isekai Saikyou
Become a Wise Man in Different World: Reincarnation and Adventurer Life
異世界転生で賢者になって冒険者生活 ～【魔法改良】で異世界最強～
My Adventurer Life: I Became the Strongest Magic-Refining Sage in a New World

title: Isekai Tensei de Kenja ni Natte Boukensha Seikatsu: "Mahou Kairyou" de Isekai Saikyou
title_english: My Adventurer Life: I Became the Strongest Magic-Refining Sage in a New World
title_japanese: 異世界転生で賢者になって冒険者生活 ～【魔法改良】で異世界最強～
title_synonyms: Become a Wise Man in Different World: Reincarnation and Adventurer Life
synopsis:
When Minato died in an unfortunate accident, he was reincarnated in a different world where magic was woefully underdeveloped. Superfluous magic circles. Barely working attack magics.

"What's with these inefficient magic?"

By getting rid of the excesses in the magic circle, the destructive capabilities of the magic can be multiplied! Furthermore, he creates the flawless Extreme magic with his own hands. With his boundless wisdom, Minato enhances magic beyond wonder. In no time, his magical powers and techniques outclassed anyone else's. In a world where magic was lost to the people, Minato is praised as an omnipotent wise man who controls all of the elements.

The tale of a wise man commanding the lost magic with overwhelming power starts now!

(Source: SB Creative, translated)
background: Isekai Tensei de Kenja ni Natte Boukensha Seikatsu: "Mahou Kairyou" de Isekai Saikyou has been published digitally in English as My Adventurer Life: I Became the Strongest Magic-Refining Sage in a New World by Square Enix through Manga UP!
